snippet: Even many supporters said they were appalled at the Israeli prime minister’s warning about Arab voters and his renunciation of a two-state solution.
abstract: Interviews with American rabbis, scholars and Jews from range of denominations reveal distaste for Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu's campaign tactics that alienated even some conservatives; many expressed concern that Netnyahu's victory will translate into further isolation of Israel from international community and will alienate younger American Jews from the country.
lead_paragraph: Even many supporters said they were appalled at the Israeli prime minister’s warning about Arab voters and his renunciation of a two-state solution.

headline.main: Netanyahu Tactics Anger Many U.S. Jews, Deepening a Divide
headline.print_headline: Israeli Leader Further Divides American Jews
